name: ASHOK SANSTHAN
briefDescription: Welcome to Ashok SansthanA lot has changed over the past 28 years in India, but our strong commitment to development remains the same. Since its formation in 1984, Ashok Sansthan has worked on issues of Natural resources, Democracy and governance, agriculture & Food Security, Biodiversity, Entrepreneur, Women and girlsâ€™ rights, Child Rights, Education, Environment, reducing rural poverty, Promoting peace, justice and secularism and solidarity beyond boundaries and many other core issues.We are pleased to launch our new website that will provide improved access to Ashok Sansthan.
